name: Mining Among the Stars
description:
Mining Among the Stars is a simple resource gathering game, based on then old Star Miner. I saw that no one had made a modern equivalent (at least a playable one) that I could see of, and decided I'd go ahead and make it. 

This is my first project ever released. I'm looking to get into the industry and I figure getting feedback and learning to put out in iterations helps me gain experience.

UPDATES

0001 - Initial release, planning more levels and upgrades for ship.
